import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import { fetchReposAction, fetchProfileAction, } from "./redux/slices/reposSlice"; import imgPic from "./img/gith.svg"; import { useState } from "react"; //client secrete ef8da0994bd009a7366be98568c34f5626d3c0dc //client id Iv1.66c955e1e8629022 //url https://github.com/settings/apps //profile //`https://api.github.com/users/${user}?client_id=${this.client_id}&client_secret=${this.client_secret}`; //repos `https://api.github.com/users/${user}/repos?per_page=${this.repos_count}&sort=${this.repos_sort}&client_id=${this.client_id}&client_secret=${this.client_secret}` function App() { const [user, setUser] = useState("tweneboah"); const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchReposAction(user)); dispatch(fetchProfileAction(user)); }, [user]); const repos = useSelector(state => state?.repos); const { loading, profileLoading, reposList, profile, error } = repos; console.log(user); return ( <>
{/* Have a question? */}

); } export default App;
